name: Carlos Saura
body:
Hi. I’m Carlos Saura. I’m a Husband and Developer with passion for building something from nothing.

I’ve started in technology for about 10 years now – most of them doing Ruby and Ruby on Rails development. I’m passionate developer about everything web and out site of the web.

Some years ago, I got involved with startups and building products. I love it and can’t imagine myself doing anything else. Currently I´m creating awesome stuff in an amazing development team at [Redbooth](http://redbooth.com/).

If you’d like to chat, feel free to contact.

* Twitter: [@csaura](http://twitter.com/csaura)
* Github: [@csaura](http://github.com/csaura)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
